channel.title: Jeremy's GitHub powered programming blog
channel.description: Ramblings of a middle aged programmer. This should be a big hit.

item.title: README
item.description:
Welcome to my GitHub page. I’m trying out Wintersmith and figured this would be a good place to give it a test run.

I have no idea what I’ll put here but maybe someday I’ll put something useful here.

For now you can check out some of my lame repos:

  • Ip to Country Code lookup service
  • FireCom
  • Static Page Test
  • Angular AdSense Calulator
  • Ruby Web Compressor

I’ll try to put something more interesting up here. No promises.

So far I like Wintersmith it’s really easy to work with, it uses a pretty forward thinking and smart design, plus I like the minimalist look and feel of the output. I’ll surely use it on some project soon.
